post.text: The man who could be your next president may be deeply indebted to another country. Do you trust him to run ours?

comment.author: Tore
comment.text: Wow! Talk about the proverbial pot calling the kettle black....You wonder why you aren't leading Trump by 50 pts...here's a clue: does the word HYPOCRITE mean anything to you???

replies.author: Levi
replies.text: ANOTHER NO pic, NO history & NO friends TROLL - F/B is being flooded with these locally AND from FOREIGN countries

replies.author: Tore
replies.text: Levi YOU can't see my friends list or any of my personal stuff because YOU are not on my friend's list. I keep my page private because I know there are people like you creepin' around
